meta-facebook: harma: ...

Please keep meta-facebook prefix on these so that top-level maintainers can filter them out.
Done

Can we get more description of what the PLDM/MCTP path is used for on harma?  It isn't clear from the code or the commit message.

(I think it is for the PSOC?)
Done
I'd prefer if we don't add ".sh" prefixes on files.
Done
Can we remove the .sh on this one too?
Done
